Container.Name: Crafty-Controller-Freddy0
Container.Overview:
An Appication to run all your minecraft servers From without a hustle. This image is as official as it becomes, built from the Official docker template provided by Crafty Controller, but with some slight modifications for unraid.
Crafty controller is a lightweight minecraft wrapper with great featuers and a awesome gui, acessible from a modern web browser. The username and password appears on the first launch in the docker logs!
Important note: for minecraft servers on 1.17 and above please use the tag to freddy0/crafty-container:3.2.1-11-16
Template should work out of the box for everyone. Before adding a server, add a folder with your mineccraft jar file in your minecraft_servers folder. In the web ui please use only /minecraft_servers/yourservername, not the unraid path.
for official support join the discord: https://discord.gg/9VJPhCE
Official Crafty Controller Page: https://craftycontrol.com/
